verse.roman:
rājādhidevyās tanayāṁ
mitravindāṁ pitṛ-ṣvasuḥ
prasahya hṛtavān kṛṣṇo
rājan rājñāṁ prapaśyatām

synonyms: rājādhidevyāḥ—of Queen Rājādhidevī; tanayām—the daughter; mitravindām—Mitravindā; pitṛ—of His father; svasuḥ—of the sister; prasahya—forcibly; hṛtavān—took away; kṛṣṇaḥ—Lord Kṛṣṇa; rājan—O King (Parīkṣit); rājñām—the kings; prapaśyatām—as they watched.
translation: My dear King, Lord Kṛṣṇa forcibly took away Princess Mitravindā, the daughter of His aunt Rājādhidevī, before the eyes of the rival kings.
